author: ET Now
title: What to buy in times of Coronavirus
description: What to buy in times of CoronavirusThe Group Chairman of Inditrade Capital says till there is some kind of solution on virus front, markets will be jittery.
content: Everyone is trying to put a bottom in place in the market. We hit 7800 earlier this month or rather late last month. When do you think the market will start falling?While the governments are taking multiple measures to help the economy as well as different se… [+6693 chars]
